title: Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief CE [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief CE [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Solve the series of unimaginable crimes that take place in a small town in the new game developed by the studio Gogii Games! In Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief you are going face to face the mysterious evil sorcerer who kidnaps little children and turns them into the dolls! Stop the evil as soon as possible, don't let yourself become the next victim. Explore the city and its beautiful locations, look for the necessary items, find the answers to all the questions. The game Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief is expected very soon, so stay tuned and be the first who finds out about the release!
